mapper.select: SELECT t.no ,s.no_spot noSpot, meet_date meetDate,t.meet_time meetTime,t.contents,t.personnel,t.gender,t.kakao,t.regdate,s.picname picName FROM together t , spotpic s WHERE s.type='K' AND t.no_spot=s.no_spot ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT t.no ,s.no_spot noSpot, meet_date meetDate,t.meet_time meetTime,t.contents,t.personnel,t.gender,t.kakao,t.regdate,s.picname picName FROM together t , spotpic s WHERE s.type='K' AND t.no_spot=s.no_spot AND t.no_spot=#{no}

SELECT s.no_spot noSpot,meet_date meetDate, t.meet_time meetTime,t.contents,t.personnel,t.gender,t.kakao,t.regdate,s.picname picName FROM together t , spotpic s WHERE s.type='K' AND t.no_spot=s.no_spot AND t.no_spot=#{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM together t, personnel p WHERE p.no_together = t.no AND t.no = #{no}

SELECT t.no no, t.meet_date meetDate, t.meet_time meetTime, t.contents contents, t.personnel personnel, t.gender gender, t.no_spot noSpot, t.kakao kakao, t.regdate regdate, d.profile profile, d.nickname nickname FROM together t, personnel p, dounor d WHERE t.no = p.no_together AND p.no_dounor = d.no AND t.no=#{no}

SELECT no, meetDate, meetTime,contents,personnel,gender, kakao,regdate, picName, r,noSpot FROM(SELECT no, meetDate, meetTime,contents,personnel,gender, kakao,regdate, picName, noSpot,rownum r FROM(SELECT t.no no, meet_date meetDate,t.meet_time meetTime,t.contents contents,t.personnel personnel,t.gender gender,t.kakao kakao,t.regdate regdate,s.picname picName,t.no_spot noSpot FROM together t, spotpic s WHERE s.type='K' AND t.no_spot=s.no_spot ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT t.NO,t.MEET_DATE meetDate,t.MEET_TIME meetTime,t.CONTENTS contents,t.PERSONNEL personnel,t.GENDER gender,t.NO_SPOT noSpot,t.KAKAO kakao,t.REGDATE, s.no spotNo, s.name spotName, s.type spotType, c.no spotPicNo,c.picname picName,c.type picType, p.no, p.no_dounor noDounor FROM together t, spot s, spotPic c, personnel p WHERE t.no_spot = s.no AND s.no = c.no_spot AND t.no = p.no_together AND c.type = 'K' AND p.no_dounor = #{no}

SELECT COUNT(*) countNum FROM(SELECT t.NO,t.MEET_DATE meetDate,t.MEET_TIME meetTime,t.CONTENTS contents,t.PERSONNEL personnel,t.GENDER gender,t.NO_SPOT noSpot,t.KAKAO kakao,t.REGDATE, s.no spotNo, s.name spotName, s.type spotType, c.no spotPicNo,c.picname picName,c.type picType, p.no, p.no_dounor noDounor FROM together t, spot s, spotPic c, personnel p WHERE t.no_spot = s.no AND s.no = c.no_spot AND t.no = p.no_together AND c.type = 'K' AND p.no_dounor = #{no})
